channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
well im thinking about buying a reseller and these are what i could offer, would you buy it for $2.20/m (per month)? (just so i know it would work). Oh and if you can get a better deal please tell me. [b]Account Features[/b] [i]# 500MB Web Space # 20GB Bandwidth (Monthly) # 200 POP3 Emails # Cpanel control panel # 5 Mailing Lists # 40 Subdomains 40 # 5 Mysql Databases # 5 FTP Accounts # Autoresponders # E-mail filters # Anti Spam Filters # Antivirus protection # SMTP (outgoing mail) # Webmail # Front Page 2002/xp # Secure Server # PHP4 # CGI-BIN/SSI # Resource Meter # Counters # Web Stats # CGI Bin # File Manager # Custom Error Pages # Password Protection # FTP Upload # Apache Handlers # Accessible Backup # Easy CGI Scripts # Shopping Cart[/i] Add 1000MB disk space to one domain in your reseller account for only £5 per month and
[b]Pre-installed CGI Scripts[/b] [i] * Agora Shopping Cart * XMB Bulletin Board (subject to you selecting a plan size that includes Mysql) * Java Chat * Html Chat * PhpMyChat (subject to you selecting a plan size that includes Mysql) * Cgi Wrapper (for non-suexec installs) * Random HTML Generator * Advanced Guestbook * Counter Generator * Java Clock Generator * Java Countdown Generator * Secure FormMail clone * Cgiemail * Entropy Search * Entropy Banner [/i]
for $2.20/m (per month)
would anyone pay for it? (im not selling it atm im just wondering if anyone would
